website_summaries.verdict: If you appreciate the idea of an especially portable fish finder that is also capable of capturing high-end sonar imagery, the best in the PiranhaMAX series was made for you.
pros: Surprisingly clear and detailed sonar imagery
See exactly what’s under your boat
Covers a huge range around and underneath a boat

customer_reviews.title: Take the sticker off before it sees sun. Or you will be sorry.
customer_reviews.text: I installed this on my boat . It sat in the sun for a day. I cannot get the sticker off to see screen. I would have taken it off before installing but I doubt that would have been easier. The sticker has bonded to the plastic screen.
customer_reviews.author: Eric L

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: For the price you really can't beat this unit. It lacks gps and sidescan but you aren't gonna get those things at this price point. The down imaging is something that most units at this price don't have. The fish alerts are good and lets you choose what of fish you will get alerts from.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Got this in the hopes that it is as tough ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this in the hopes that it is as tough and reliable as the last hummingbird I had that was from the early 1990s and I left it on the boat in all types of weather, it just quit working this year, and for the simple operating system. So far it has proven itself so I got another for my pontoon boat.
customer_reviews.author: clarence w. slaubaugh

customer_reviews.title: Missing product in package.
customer_reviews.text: Received this product fast, but upon arrival and opening of the box I found out the fishfinder and mount was missing from the package. I immediately took a picture and called amazon within two minutes of opening. The gentleman was very understanding and said it happens all the time. Well this was the second time it had happened to me with different products. I returned the package with its contents which was the cables, instructions, and two screws. Amazon refunded my money. I did purchase this from a local big box store shortly after. The fish finder is nice the screen is good size and the brightness is perfect for sunny days.
customer_reviews.author: Will S

customer_reviews.title: You pay for what you get
customer_reviews.text: Unit keeps jumping from 2 ft to whatever depth of water I'm in, also can't get color line adjusted right, done everything instructions said to do, maybe its a defective unit
customer_reviews.author: john mcnabb

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to the small boat
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for use on our small boat and it has performed flawlessly. Easily switches from sonar with fish alarm to high resolution down imaging. Definitely a winner for my application.
customer_reviews.author: BGTG94

customer_reviews.title: The depth and what on the bottom
customer_reviews.text: It does a great job show's the fish and what depth there at . Show the bottom and weeds IAM happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: OK for shallow waters
customer_reviews.text: transducer is only accurate to 35' in calm water. But it is inexpensive
customer_reviews.author: mynewfies

customer_reviews.title: Damage
customer_reviews.text: Package was damage when opened the box.Tested it and there’s power but haven’t had time to test it on the water
customer_reviews.author: Chai Y.

customer_reviews.title: Temperture function quit working.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about 6 months then the water temp function went out. The other function worked good.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Pardue

customer_reviews.title: Could not see screen in sunlight.
customer_reviews.text: Sharpness was could but I could not view the screen in sunlight.
customer_reviews.author: RobFromCT

customer_reviews.title: Easy replacement for our prior hummingbird
customer_reviews.text: It was plug and play as a replacement for our older hummingbird on our Boston whaler that died. Fit in the same dash mount and cords plugged right in. Upgraded color display (prior was B&W) and easy to use. Great price. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S.

customer_reviews.title: Good wile it worked.
customer_reviews.text: The settings do not save when you turn off the unit. Not hard to set just a pain to set depth back to auto every time you turn it on. The antenna broke at the neck very slowly from normal use and hummingbird did not warranty the antenna. I payed around 140 dollars for the unit and they wanted 160 to replace the antenna. Would not even discuss it just said it was broken by abuse. If lake water is abuse the need to build it better. There snippy attitude was much un appreciate and un warranted. I am going to try a Garmin. The are the same features plus gps and same price. Any one need a broken hummingbird?
customer_reviews.author: Phillip R.

customer_reviews.title: Worthless !
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son. He just now had the time to install it as the weather is just becoming nice for fishing in our area. He is a tec mechanic and works with electronics and such. This product will not work right out of the box. Nothing on the screen. Save your money. It is worthless!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ruby G.

customer_reviews.title: Misrepresentation
customer_reviews.text: Under the review section someone ask if this unit had down scan image and a representative answered saying yes when in fact it isn’t. I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Billy I.

customer_reviews.title: Love the unit
customer_reviews.text: This unit is very easy to use and very accurate. Running against a few of my friends models that were a lot more expensive. Worked just as good. Perfect for smaller boats or a kayak or really any place that you don't want a large unit taking up all the space.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Franklin

customer_reviews.title: DEAD on unboxing.....
customer_reviews.text: Unit will not turn on when installed. 4/13/2020. Just got the boat out of storage after winter. Wired up to boat....will not power up. rechecked voltage from battery....12.4 volts. Made sure inline fuse....not power....rechecked power again... all good.....still unit will not power up. DOA. Pissed. Waited 3 months to install because winter here....now I'm ready to go fishing and Crap unit.
customer_reviews.author: Keven Ormiston

customer_reviews.title: Came incomplete
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this at a slightly lower price but it came with NO mounting hardware and a bag full of random things like batteries and antennas in which the fish finder doesnt need or require
customer_reviews.author: justin

customer_reviews.title: SUPER FINDER for the money!!
customer_reviews.text: Great system for the money, super easy set up, nice color graphics, quick response time!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: bought a warranty. lasted a year. need to replace it how do i do it
customer_reviews.author: raymond a. miller

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate,  controls lacking
customer_reviews.text: Always defaults to down imaging and requires scrolling through menus in un-intuitive ways.
customer_reviews.author: GMD

customer_reviews.title: It will not stay on when you pressed the power button
customer_reviews.text: My boat went down when I Purchase this unit just took it out the Box after a year and it does not work
customer_reviews.author: Paul Payton

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Nice Nice to see the depth of the water and watch the fish and watch the fish Under the boat
customer_reviews.author: Denise J.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and use
customer_reviews.text: Added it to my kayak, works nice and is small and compact
customer_reviews.author: Curt

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Nice little fish finder. DI isn’t as great as I thought it would be
customer_reviews.author: rob chernak

customer_reviews.title: this is not returnable by Amazon don't buy it unless you are very sure
customer_reviews.text: i cannot use this product and Amazon will not take it back as a return. it is not what I wanted and cannot use it at all. I recommend that it not be purchased through Amazon. left a very bad taste in my mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: The important thing to know is that it does the job which that is made for
customer_reviews.text: It’s only trying to encourage The person that’s about it . It is not really showing the fish.
customer_reviews.author: Hein

customer_reviews.title: Trust the brand
customer_reviews.text: Second time to purchase this brand. Very reliable. I fish almost daily on a small lake.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Depth finder fishfinder
customer_reviews.text: A regular 2 1/8 inch gauge shows depth and cost more than this fishfinder sonar. Outstanding value highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: John Baker

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, easy to use. what I expected
customer_reviews.author: Ralph R.

customer_reviews.title: Great for first time users
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy this unit I do however wish I woulda spent the extra 40 bucks for the down imagining unit but over all it’s a great unit !
customer_reviews.author: Allen Hall

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriends boat and would recommend it to anyone. Easy to read the fish.
customer_reviews.author: samantha

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting battery
customer_reviews.text: Humminbird never disappoints. Great for fly in trips. Battery lasted 6 days before needing charged
customer_reviews.author: Tuls

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT work.
customer_reviews.text: Does not work with boat prop down, which makes the finder basically useless. Unable to return, very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Disharoon

customer_reviews.title: You can look but I won't touch!
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. It will show you all the fish that will not bite your hook.
customer_reviews.author: T. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Everyone can use it with ease
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and works very well just as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Karri Lerch

customer_reviews.title: the best for the
customer_reviews.text: I had 4 deep sounders before these, all them behaved erratically, these worked as specked, the best for the money
customer_reviews.author: F. Petrilli

customer_reviews.title: Great tech for the $$
customer_reviews.text: For the price point I'm not sure how you could hope for any more. The imaging tech is awesome and it works great in my pond prowler. Downside pointed out by previous review about having to reset the menu every time is correct, but it's just a couple button-pushes. If you want a simple but effective fishfinder for a car-topper, kayak, or lake/pond boat, it's a win.
customer_reviews.author: drudow

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it get one with a gps
customer_reviews.text: For a little more you can get a different brand with GPS and Chirp technology so you can mark spots and also see your true boat speed....
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Nice features.
customer_reviews.text: Hey...it's a Hummingbird. Comes with everything. Works great like they always do. The 2d is very handy. Great fish finder/ depth finder/ structure locator for the money. GOOD BANG FOR THE BUCK!
customer_reviews.author: Horse

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to keep transponder attached to boat with suction cup
customer_reviews.text: Use on my pond buster 10 ft plastic boat. Works well except the suction cup on the transponder will not, WILL NOT stay attached to the boat when moving.. Very aggravating when you spend more time trying to keep it attached then you do fishing Also the fabric carrying case is useless, it is to small for the carrier the fish finder fits into.. if you get the carrier into the fabric cover you can to get the battery into it also. And if you do you can not connect the battery to the fish finder Totally useless
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: portable gear now.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a portable, so I installed this in a box with a small sized battery and installed the transducer on the boat. I don't have a very secure storage area for my little boat, so this works best for me.
customer_reviews.author: tango

customer_reviews.title: Dud
customer_reviews.text: Unit was easy to set up. Put it on the boat - it functioned great for about 2 minutes and then lost power completely. Not able to turn it on at all. Put in a new fuse - that wasn't it. Battery was charged. It just stopped working. I have this unit on another boat and it works well - must have just gotten a dud.
customer_reviews.author: A. A. Lindner

customer_reviews.title: Use common sense when assembling parts. Be cautious of plastic parts and do not force fit anything.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best choice for my Kayak. Tested today at a local fishing area and discovered I did not really know anything about my favorite fishing hole! Truly amazing clarity, accurate depth readings, and bottom topography blew me away. I now know exactly where to go to harvest fish >>-> , >>-> , >> ->
customer_reviews.author: JCR

customer_reviews.title: Hummingbird Sounders are great
customer_reviews.text: I have used Hummingbird depth sounders for years. I have owned quite a few units over the years and they are always easy to setup on the boat and they are easy to use. I recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Gncantwell

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Installed easily. I added a 1 amp inline fuse alligator clips to run off a 12v battery in my small boat. Easy to use and surprisingly detailed image with the down imaging for the cost. Probably going to add one on the front of my bigger boat in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: DaniLee14

customer_reviews.title: Nice entry level depth/fish finder
customer_reviews.text: This a nice economy fish depth finder. This works great for finding those breaks in depth and it alerts you when the fish swim under.
customer_reviews.author: Mark H

customer_reviews.title: get the bigger screen
customer_reviews.text: nice unit but wish I had purchased the larger screen
customer_reviews.author: BIG_G_UN

customer_reviews.title: Worth the used price
customer_reviews.text: Got a used one and it had never been open so I was very happy
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Compact and accurate
customer_reviews.text: Great display of depth and temp. Works especially well in shallow water.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E. Levan

customer_reviews.title: Easy install. I sent the transponder to the company ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy install. I sent the transponder to the company and they sent a transponder for a trolling motor at no cost. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: NL

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Just good fish finder. Turn it on and it works.
customer_reviews.author: Ray S

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Mate says it works very well. Does all he want's It to.Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Dixilee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best one I have ever had great product recommended Edwin
customer_reviews.author: Niwde

product_meta.title: Humminbird 410170-1 PIRANHAMAX 4 PT (Portable) Fish Finder
product_meta.description: Style:PIRANHAMAX 4 PTPIRANHAMAX 4 - Sharper image Sharper teeth With modern styling and large 4 3" color LCD the new MAX 4 will give you a fresh perspective on what’s below your boat Thanks to a redesigned even easier-to-use interface unlocking the power of optional Down Imaging Fish ID+ fish alarms depth alarms and zoom has never been simpler Feature for feature it packs a technological chomp that no fish finder in its class can match ​​FEATURES Dual Beam Sonar Choose from a narrow and a wide beam for great detail or a generous coverage area helping you identify fish structure and contours Down Imaging Get a clear view of what's happening below your boat with Down Imaging As you patrol the water you'll watch timber brush bridge pilings rocks and any other structure pop with great detail Tilt and Swivel Mount Quickly adjust your viewing area angle SPECIFICATIONS Display Size Diagonal - 4 3" Display Pixel Matrix - 480 V x 272 H Unit Size - 3 9" W x 6 8" H x 3 6" D Display Color Grayscale - 256 colors Sonar Standards - Dual Frequency and Down Imaging (DI model only) Target Separation - 2 5" Power Output RMS - 300 Watts Power Output Peak-to-Peak - 2 400 Watts Depth Capability - 320' (DI) & 600'
feature_bullets: Depth Sonar 320 ft (20) 455 kHz 600 ft (20) 200 kHz

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars333 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Humminbird 410170-1 PIRANHAMAX 4 PT Fishfinder with Dual Frequency Portable Sonar
